name: TimeFort 1555 (Demo)
description:
Hull, your city, is under attack. Time is a weapon in a war that could shape the flow of history. Only you can save your present and our future...

Battle for the future of the city of Hull - travel back in time, battle monsters from beyond reality, and fight to save history... if you dare! 

"Timefort 1555" is the third game from the Goodwin Development Trust's Youth Arts Takeover project. This demo sees the player travel to the year 1555 to fight monsters and terrorists from the future! 

Made in conjunction with Humber Field Archaeology.

Arriving in the past Comlink from the future
The Aegis
